description: Relatives of those who died during the pandemic were among those attending St George's Church.
title: Coronavirus: Service remembers Isle of Man Covid-19 victims
title_page: Coronavirus: Service remembers Isle of Man Covid-19 victims - BBC News
maintext: During the service, the Bishop of Sodor and Man Rt Rev Peter Eagles said remembering those who died was "not just an act of the mind, but an act of the heart, an act of the soul, an act of the spirit, an act of love".
